price: 95. En voorwaar, Wij zijn in staat om jou te laten zien waarmee Wij hen bedreigd hebben.
arabic: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمۡ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā ʿalā an nuriyaka mā naʿiduhum laqādirūna
